description: This file demonstrates the usage of the TogetherEmbedder to generate embeddings for a text string and initializes an AgentKnowledge object with a PgVector database connection, embedding configuration, and document count.

methods.name: get_embedding
methods.description: Generates embeddings for a given text string using the TogetherEmbedder.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes instances of PgVector and AgentKnowledge with specified parameters.
